quote: Artificial intelligence is the new electricity.
author: Andrew Ng

quote: The question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim.
author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quote: Computers are able to see, hear and learn. Welcome to the future.
author: Dave Waters

quote: Predicting the future isn't magic, it's artificial intelligence.
author: Dave Waters

quote: AI will not replace you. A person using AI will.
author: Unknown
